name: field-service-platform-dev
description: Complete development environment for a multi-tenant field service management platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Supabase
longDescription:
This plugin provides a comprehensive development environment for the Field Service Management Platform, including specialized agents for feature development, database architecture, testing, bug fixing, deployment, and code review. It enforces Quebec French UI standards, mobile-first design (640px), 100% test coverage, and Row Level Security for multi-tenancy.

Includes 6 specialized agents, 10 custom skills, 3 output styles, comprehensive hooks system, and complete MCP/LSP integrations.
